300 OFWs na sasailalim sa quarantine, hinarang sa Lian, Batangas dahil sa 'fake news' na may COVID-19 sila tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735363 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/735363/300-ofws-na-sasailalim-sa-quarantine-hinarang-sa-lian-batangas-dahil-sa-fake-news-na-may-covid-19-sila/story/ Pagod sa biyahe at sa mahabang proseso para makauwi sa bansa, ang makapagpahinga na sa hotel na magiging quarantine facility sa Lian, Batangas ang tanging nasa isip nila. RITM neglected for decades for being Marcos-built, says Imee tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735349 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/735349/ritm-neglected-for-decades-for-being-marcos-built-says-imee/story/ The Research Institute for Tropical Medicine (RITM), established almost four decades ago, is having a "gloomy" founding anniversary on Thursday as a result of long years of neglect, Senator Imee Marcos said."The long neglect of RITM dates back more than 30 years ago when the Cory administration started treating it like a leper, just because it was built by my father, then President Ferdinand Edralin Marcos, through Executive Order No. 674 in 1981," the senator said in a statement. Thu, 23 Apr 2020 20:25:11 +0800
